title: Biri Biri Band
keywords: paramana, work, project, Biri Biri Band website, design & development
description: Τhe website of Biri Biri Band was designed and developed by Paramana.com
maintext:
The funky website of a funk band!

Biri Biri is an eight-members group first seen on stage in Heraklion Crete.

Their website includes demo tracks fromtheir first album as well as a photo album, a guuest book, a poster's archive, videos and interesting links.

With jQuery animations and a minimal design based the band's logo, we wanted the website to match the band's style pleasing both the artists and their fans!
techstext: XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ΧΜL, PHP, MySQL
